the game devs dont listen to their community and just continue to implement bad updates over and over again, they barely change anything after the ptbs, they dont care to fix some old bugs that have been in the game for what feels like forever

This game is trash. The player base of this game is full of degenerates and nothing else. No wonder the world is going to crap. If you love this, good for you. Their is no nice people in this game and everyone deserves to go to hell.

It's a hard sell in it's current state. It's a game that costs $20 to get into, then an additional $80ish to buy everyone else. I can't recommend this to anyone right now, maybe if it went to a F2P model. On top of that, you need an absurd amount of time in the game to unlock perks for all the killers. I'm writing this at 620 hours, and only done with half the killer roster.

i've played dead by daylight an unhealthy amount, (not as much as some of you, though) and to be honest...
it's a great game, it's fun, i love playing with friends and somehow, it manages to be addicting.

but now?

oh my god. the game feels so painful. the hit boxes are terrible, the UI feels like a cheap mobile game on my screen, and the animations- to be honest the animations are fine but everything else makes the game feel so foreign and unplayable. i can't see myself playing anymore until something is fixed, nothing is fun anymore.

anyway, freddy hav 7 meter lunge can kill you from 10 years away

O jogo era muito bom, realmente me apaixonei pelo jogo por mais problemas que tivesse, era divertido e de certa forma justo, agora com o update 4.5.0 estÃ¡ injogÃ¡vel. NÃ£o digo nem em relaÃ§Ã£o a HUD(UI) do jogo, quebraram a movimentaÃ§Ã£o de tal forma que nÃ£o tem como vocÃª como sobrevivente se divertir nesse jogo. E a pior parte Ã© que a comunidade avisou os Devs que isso ia acontecer e ele simplesmente ignoraram (vai $$$aber o porque), deixo aqui uma nota de desgosto de quem gastou 430 horas pra ver o jogo se tornar este completo lixo. Recomendo nÃ£o comprar se vocÃª nÃ£o quer jogar um jogo feito por uma empresa que caga para o feedback da comunidade.
This game's title is accurate, you'll be dead

I rarely make any reviews and I really like this game in general. However, this new update is really a double slap in the face by the devs to the community. The hit box is absolutely garbage right now like they didn't even test run it nor did they ask the players beforehand. Some of the map reworks are highly questionable. The new UI is a step in the wrong direction in my opinion. If anything, the UI should be an option. When you're playing this game for a long time, this just blocks the view of survivors in my opinion. Besides the newest updates, I feel the couple past ones punish newer survivors too much and give way too much power to the killer. I see too many new survivor players just quit the game due to the devs still not punishing killer hard camping behavior in 2021 coupled with the recent updates to benefit killers on some maps. I mean for real, the hit box has been kinda bad lately tbh before this update even with low ping.

The community can be really toxic too for new players to be honest. A lot of friends I used to play this with have already quit. I can consistently get rank 1 or 2 every update, but it takes a toxic killer player to ruin the game by literally face camping even at high ranks. They could put certain mechanics to circumvent this problem without screwing killers but they are putting efforts in the wrong places.

I may not be the most active of players.
I may not be the greatest.
But i've had this game for a long time.
Seen many things added and removed.
The initial spark that everyone saw has been long since dead. the legacy that spark has is still there.
Yes the game is unbalanced. but is any game really balanced fairly?
for what i've seen in 2016 and what i see now, the game is way more fair than before. Less and more in some ways.
But compared to the base game. There is so much more to choose from. Many more play styles. Many more perks.
And while the atmosphere of the uber scary foggy horror game is gone due to lighting and fog being re-worked to hell. 
It is still some fun game. 
though i miss many things..
solid 7/10

As of the time of writing, the devs don't listen to community feedback. They pretend that they'll do it!

But they don't. And they probably won't. 

I really wish this game to be the best that it could. But it just isn't, because the devs don't listen to community feedback.

If you're planning to play with your friends and you don't yet have the game, don't bother buying it now. Wait until it is in a much better state. As much as it pains me to say this, don't buy this game. Now, at least.
Edit : even worse than I thought.

Devs suck, grind is ridiculous with tons of locked DLC characters overwhelming to new players. The base game is a lot of fun; just don't take it too seriously. Hopefully many quality-of-life changes are pending for the future.

The newest update to this game has officially ruined it. There is no return for this game until the developers fix what they have done. Between getting hit 15 feet away from the killer to the very bad balance system. This game quite literally has died.

Por mais que eu esteja Ã  beira de completar mil horas dentro do jogo, eu nÃ£o recomendaria pra um amigo. O jogo Ã© bugado pra caralho, sempre que sai uma patch novo, bugs novos aparecem e antigos ressurgem. Isso acontece muito provavelmente porque quando o jogo foi feito em 2016, eles usavam uma linguagem de programaÃ§Ã£o muito ultrapassada (Blueprints). Eventualmente, eles passaram a programar em C++, mas fizeram isso em cima da bagunÃ§a que era (ainda Ã©) o cÃ³digo em Blueprints.

Portanto, o que vocÃª mais vai encontrar nesse jogo sÃ£o bugs, por mais que eles faÃ§am patch notes, que nem sÃ£o tÃ£o regulares assim. Direto um sobrevivente fica sem fazer barulhos quando tÃ¡ machucado, vocÃª fica preso numa parede invisÃ­vel que nÃ£o deveria estar lÃ¡, sem falar dos bugs especÃ­ficos de cada assassino (Victor ficando preso em estruturas, Nurse nÃ£o conseguindo teleportar, armadilhas do Trapper spawnando em lugares que nÃ£o dÃ¡ pra pegar, e assim em diante...).

E nÃ£o sÃ£o apenas os bugs que fazem desse jogo um circo. Os desenvolvedores sÃ£o MUITO teimosos. Se eles tÃªm algo na cabeÃ§a que querem colocar no jogo, nÃ£o tem o que impeÃ§a. Quando eles proporam uma reformulaÃ§Ã£o da interface e animaÃ§Ãµes dos personagens do jogo na atualizaÃ§Ã£o 4.5.0, tiveram 1 mÃªs pra coletar feedback antes que a atualizaÃ§Ã£o viesse ao live. NINGUÃ‰M gostou de nada, e todo mundo meteu a lenha na interface que ficou parecendo de um jogo mobile. Mas quando chegou o dia do lanÃ§amento, eles tacaram o foda-se pra comunidade inteira e implementaram a atualizaÃ§Ã£o mesmo assim. E detalhe que com essa atualizaÃ§Ã£o, veio um bug que quebrou o jogo, mas que ficou sem soluÃ§Ã£o por quase um mÃªs. A hitbox dos sobreviventes estava dessincronizada com o ponto de vista do assassino, fazendo parecer que vocÃª estava mais longe dele, sendo que vocÃª estava logo Ã  frente. Isso rendeu semanas e semanas de hits levados a 10 metros de distÃ¢ncia.

Felizmente, depois que viram a cagada que fizeram e as reviews da Steam despencaram, fizeram algumas mudanÃ§as e o jogo passou a ficar suportÃ¡vel novamente. Ajustaram um pouquinho a interface tambÃ©m, mas nÃ£o chega nem perto da antiga, que nunca teve problema nenhum e nenhuma necessidade de ser alterada. 

Outro problema Ã© que o meta do jogo nÃ£o Ã© nada flexÃ­vel. Quando vocÃª pega o ritmo do jogo e alcanÃ§a certo skill cap, espere ver apenas 10 perks dentre as 170 disponibilizadas no jogo sendo usadas em TODA PARTIDA. Tanto do lado dos sobreviventes quanto do assassino. Se os desenvolvedores mudam alguma coisa, sÃ£o no mÃ¡ximo 5 perks a cada 6 meses. Boa sorte tendo que usar sempre as mesmas habilidades o tempo todo.

Enfim, o jogo tem MUITOS lados negativos mas nÃ£o Ã© de todo mau, senÃ£o eu provavelmente nÃ£o estaria viciado nele. VocÃª tem basicamente dois jogos em um sÃ³: jogando sozinho de assassino, tentando matar os 4 sobreviventes e impedindo que elas fujam. Ou entrando em uma equipe com mais 3 pessoas, de sobrevivente, para reparar geradores, evadir o assassino e tentar escapar vivo. A experiÃªncia Ã© ainda mais divertida quando se estÃ¡ com amigos em call. 

O jogo tem uma premissa maravilhosa, mas a execuÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o Ã© das melhores. DBD seria 10 vezes melhor se os desenvolvedores nÃ£o fossem tÃ£o cabeÃ§a dura e preguiÃ§osos, a ponto de escutar feedback dos seus jogadores e tentar reformular o meta de vez em quando.

7/10. Vou continuar jogando ;-;

After 4.5.0, I got the confidence to say that this game will never be patched because devs still makes changes that people hate and doesn't want. This game has only playerbase because they hope someday the game will be good but after years looking at that shit they wont fix anything. Dead Hard is easily broken for a long while, they never fixed it. This game failed to balance a lot of perks, addons etc. The game lacks of optimization and polish to the graphics, it took them years to implement basic extremely simple animations for fixing generatiors which is like 25% of a survivors game. Everyone has an abusive relationship with this game because you hope that the game will get better but it doesnt they only add new dlcs to make money they never do actual QoL updates that are meaningful for the community they seem hate so much by never giving them what they want.

Pay to win. Grind that Korean MMOs are jealous of. Balancing worse than Overwatch. Almost as buggy as launch day Cyberpunk 2077. This game is hide and go seek tag mixed alongside popular horror licenses - all held together by glue, duct tape and dead carcasses.

If skillbased matchmaking becomes a thing, I will never play this game again. DBD isn't fun because it's balanced, it's the opposite! This game shines when people get to dominate the match because of their skill-difference. Today was the most boring game session of DBD ever, because they enabled SBM for a day.

EDIT, IT BECAME A THING, THIS GAME NOW SUCKS.

Recomendaria este juego antes de la actualizacion 4.5.0, realmente esta actualizacion estropeo el juego, lleno de bugs y el asesino esta ahora muy poderoso y esta roto, pega desde lejos y va demasiado rapido, como main survivor ya no es entretenido jugar denuevo. A esperar a que lo arreglen y por mientras jugar otros juegos.

Basura de update, es imbecil que te el asesino te vea a melee y tÃº lo veas a 4 metros es simplemente imbecil, 265 horas para que ahora con una simple update me aburra, pobrecitos los que tienen mÃ¡s de 1000 horas

despues de haber jugado 218 horas mas puedo decir con certeza que los desarrolladores solo buscan ganar dinero con este juego, no han habido parches para solucionar el tema de los "hitbox" en asesinos que te pegan a 2 metros de distancia, pesima decision haber despedido al staff de desarrolladores de la version de pc y haberse quedado con los de movil, un real asco.

Only god can save this game now
I can complain about a lot of things when it comes to this game, but I still play it almost everyday. Gotta be a reason for that, eh?

The developers of this game do not take into account what the players want and instead continuously put out garbage updates. Yet another update with broken systems, broken hitboxes and a shitty new UI no one asked for that is effectively worse than the archaic one it had before. But hey, at least there are new skins and a new "battle pass", which btw is also terribly poorly done, letting you only do one "challenge" per game, for you to buy ;) ;)


EDIT 15/06/2021 RESIDENT EVIL DLC RELEASE DAY
Guess what? Another amazing update by BHVR. Some pallets vanish after you drop them, the new map was disabled 2 hours after release, cosmetic sets for the new characters were hotfixed to make you buy the full set instead of parts, because the full set only had one part different. So there you go, want a skirt instead of pants? Pay full set price for that, keeping the exact same hair and shirt for your new character. 
OH, AND EVEN BETTER. Were you one of the pople that bought the part before the hotfix? Well, fuck you then, now you can't wear it anymore unless you buy the full set.

The devs put out this kind of untested and money grabbing garbage every 3 months, breaking the game for a week or two, collecting on all the new skins people buy and not giving a fuck.

Lots of potential, shitty devs. Do not get sucked into this BS.

This game is cool. I really like how the game has glowed over the years with updates. I mean, back then the target hook box was so fucking shitty. Overall, this game has improved a lot with the graphics. I want to talk about the killers, bc the most recent one that they added 'The Twins' is not my favorite one. I really do think they could have gone with a much refreshing approach with the killer. The Twins is like another mini huntress, ngl. I feel like the devs of the game really had no new ideas on how to make a new killer that they just used huntress' template. The Twins could have really been a good killer if it was made properly. This game is fun with friends, although, I feel like the community can be a bit toxic. Overall, I enjoy playing the game. However, I dont like how i have to keep playing OVER and OVER again to keep my rank the same.

good but buggy

Great, fun and addicting game. I highly recommend. One needs to put in many hours in order to get good. However, that makes the game even more addicting and successful. Playing with a crew you know is very fun and even SOlO QUE is good. Try not to get angry because it will take thousands of tries in order to get better at fleeing the killer. Technique is your best friend in this game and being patient. If your in a bad mood or anxious playing this game will leave you steamed. Have fun and most importantly spread the positive vibes with other teammates you are playing with. Attitude is very contagious. Good luck and have fun!
